      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "dD6wrlL2ShBH"
      },
      "source": [

      "source": [
        "### 5.2 Comparison"
      ]
    },
    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "metadata": {
        "id": "avEnIBt6ShBI",
        "outputId": "172f14b2-40d5-45b1-f7c7-5ac268df0f1a"
      },
      "source": [
        "a = np.arange(1, 10).reshape(3,3)\n",
        "b = np.arange(9, 0, -1).reshape(3,3)\n",
        "print(a)\n",
        "print(b)"
      ],
      "execution_count": null,
      "outputs": [
        {
          "output_type": "stream",
          "text": [
            "[[1 2 3]\n",
            " [4 5 6]\n",
            " [7 8 9]]\n",
            "[[9 8 7]\n",
            " [6 5 4]\n",
            " [3 2 1]]\n"
          ],
          "name": "stdout"
        }
      ]
